The new periodic terms added to the Moon’s longitude 
are perfectly insignificant, the coefficient of that involving cos(c’wv-w’)
which is by far the largest of them, only amounting to 0”.003
Transforming the expressions found above, so as 
to obtain the moon’s longitude & Radius Vector in terms 
of the time, & writing for convenience nt instead of [integral]ndt 
we have 
[equations not transcribed]
